Faceless

Ano: 2021

IMDb ID: tt4372326

Classificação: 4.1

Sinopse: A disoriented and frightened man awakens in a hospital room to discover he's the recipient of a full face transplant. Plagued by weird flashbacks, no memory and no visitors, he is unprepared when they release him from the hospital. When a mysterious red- haired woman, Sophie, befriends him, life gets even weirder. Suddenly a hooded man stalks him, his friends abandon him, and strangers give him odd looks. Distraught he goes out drinking only to end up in an altercation with a man - who has no face! Now he must investigate what has happened and who is stalking him before it's too late...
